Name: oid
Description: row identifier (hidden attribute; must be explicitly selected)

Name: extnamespace
Description: schema containing the extension's exported objects

Name: extrelocatable
Description: true if extension can be relocated to another schema

Name: extconfig
Description: array of regclass oids for the extension's configuration table(s), or null if none

Name: extcondition
Description: array of where-clause filter conditions for the extension's configuration table(s), or null if none
